numeralping.title: Numeral Ping
numeralping.option.playerList.desc: Enable numeral ping in the player list.
numeralping.option.serverList.desc: Enable numeral ping in the server list.
numeralping.option.smallPing.desc: Shrink the ping text using alternative Unicode characters.
Highest ping value for the default colour.
numeralping.option.levelOnePingThreshold: Highest ping value for the level one colour.
numeralping.option.levelTwoPingThreshold: Highest ping value for the level two colour.
numeralping.option.levelThreePingThresho: Highest ping value for the level three colour.
